subject: Predict the TopCoder Collegiate Challenge Web Design
body:
Hello sm1lies,

Which design for the TopCoder Collegiate Challenge website will pass with flying colors? We want your input. 

In this new predictive vote, we're asking for your help in determining what the TopCoder community will want for the TCCC07 site.

Vote now: http://www.topcoder.com/to/?module=ViewBallot&rd=2036

Or discuss this vote here: http://studio.topcoder.com/forums?module=ThreadList&forumID=49

The contest closes on Wednesday, May 2 at 2:00 PM EDT.

Thank you, and best of luck to you in the Arena!

- The TopCoder Competitions Team 

 
===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder competitions. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, log in to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'. In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails. Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
